org.apache.ignite.binary

Interface BinarySerializer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BinaryReflectiveSerializer

    public interface BinarySerializer
    Interface that allows to implement custom serialization logic for binary objects. Can be used instead of Binarylizable in case if the class cannot be changed directly.

    Binary serializer can be configured for all binary objects via BinaryConfiguration.getSerializer() method, or for a specific binary type via BinaryTypeConfiguration.getSerializer() method.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void readBinary(Object obj, BinaryReader reader)
      Reads fields from provided reader.
      void writeBinary(Object obj, BinaryWriter writer)
      Writes fields to provided writer.
